Reviews.Title: Good door chime
Reviews.Author: komboa
Reviews.Content: I got tired of missing so many packages by delivery personnel, but I missed this package the first day it came, which reinforced my reason for needing it in the first place. Then when I got it after the weekend, there were no clear instructions except the poorly worded and badly illustrated box. It took me a half-hour to figure out how to open the door bell section, but after that and I loaded in the included battery and installed it, it was child's play. I must say, it did work very well, and I put the chime section on the wall in my office on a screw provided. It's loud, even on the "medium" setting, but it's supposed to be in order to do its job.This device is worth the money, and works very well. The entire experience was not perfect, sort of aggravating actually, but after getting the back of the door bell open, it went very quickly. Someone with better common sense or who is more intuitive could have set it up in 5 minutes. Buy it, you won't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Wireless remote doorbell
Reviews.Author: Herb
Reviews.Content: This wireless doorbell works great. I installed it about 100 feet away and it works perfectly. It has 3 volume settings. I chose medium. It says it has 10 chimes when in fact it has about 38. The first one is the usual ding-dong which is what I chose. The 2nd one has the same ding-dong followed by an unintelligible voice. The only word I could make out was "door". The rest of the chimes range from the traditional Winchester chimes to classical themes that are waaay too long, unless you are expecting Cleopatra to arrive carried by slaves. There are other "spoken" greetings. You can make a game out of trying to decipher what is being said. The only other thing I would have liked was to be able to record my own sounds. If you want a traditional doorbell that is easy to install, this is it, and you can't beat the price. Here is the link to it:Voye 72-20488 Wireless Remote Control Doorbell with 10 Different Chimes

Reviews.Title: Good product for that price
Reviews.Author: More "Meli"
Reviews.Content: I recommend this product it's cheap and works great, has 8 tunes to choose, and the sound is loud and clear

Reviews.Title: Very Poor Purchase
Reviews.Author: kyhunter01
Reviews.Content: Nowhere on the ad does it state the door bell switch is not for outside use and the installation instructions are completely covered by a product stocking stikker that is impossible to remove. It is only after you receive and install this item that you learn it sounds more like a kids toy than a functioning doorbell; and only after it does some damage to your proprty that you search online and find it shoud not be installed in either rain or sunlight. I believe this item is misrepresented and I consider it one of my poorest of purchases.

Reviews.Title: PLEASE don't buy this
Reviews.Author: Sarah Leah "Sarah Leah"
Reviews.Content: I bought this on the basis of the reviews.  What a let down!!  When it advertised that it had many options for ringers, I was assuming doorbell sounds NOT a playlist of the worst songs imaginable including classical songs.  WHO wants a doorbell that plays songs and not bell chimes????  not me!  Also, the adhesive on the sticker that hangs up the button doesn't stick.  It kept falling off!  This product is a joke

Reviews.Title: good item
Reviews.Author: Cathy "cathy"
Reviews.Content: I like this item.  I needed a doorbell I could hear and this is it. Easy to install and has held up well. It is very loud but for my needs it was good. Has nice sounds that you can change if you wish.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded Expectations
Reviews.Author: Catalicious
Reviews.Content: Based on the other reviews I was worried this could be a hit or miss purchase.  This was a hit.  We have a manufactured home that did not come with a doorbell.  With our kids getting older we have a more visitors and so we decided it was time to install a doorbell.  We looked at the big box hardware stores then I went to Amazon to see what I could find.  This low cost wireless doorbell has three different volumes, the loud is very loud and the low volume is not really soft, but is loud enough to hear in any room of our house.  There are 38 different ring patterns including a Christmas song and there are several that are quite pleasant while others are quite annoying.We haven't had a problem with the signal getting from where we have placed the door bell button on our porch to the door bell ringer and we have chosen not to mount the chime to the wall, instead we have it put it on top of our cabinets in our kitchen so it is inconspicuous.  I am not sure if this would be a great door bell for a large house where there is a large distance between the ringer and the chime, but for a smaller house this is perfect.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: RolyTron
Reviews.Content: While this product was worth $11, I'm sorry I didn't go for something a little pricier.  Everything about it feels cheap; the doorbell button doesn't even close well.  The sound is VERY loud and the least long/annoying sound make it sound like one of those store entry notifications:  "ddddddiiiiiinnnnggggg ddoonngg...ddddddiiiiiinnnnggggg ddoonngg"  The rest are poor quality jingles which sound like the old nokia cell phones bad ringtones.  All that being said, I am using it and probably won't replace it...

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied.
Reviews.Author: Sudarshan P. Singh
Reviews.Content: Works quite well. The bell is loud enough to be heard unmistakably. We are using the default "Ding Dong" chime. I like the feedback light that comes on to tell visitors that the button for ringing the bell was successfully pressed.

Reviews.Title: DEAD ON ARRIVAL
Reviews.Author: Brass625
Reviews.Content: Put the batteries in and nothing.  Checked and rechecked the batteries, still nothing, no sound.  It was cheap and that's what I got.  Cheap and not working.  However, Amazon returns are easy and fast.  The hunt continues........

Reviews.Title: I have bought several of these.
Reviews.Author: megumi
Reviews.Content: I buy these for my dad, who is disabled, so he can ring when he needs assistance. They are nice and loud, wireless, cheap and simple. I have had a couple that have broken after some use (oddly started ringing nonstop without pressing the button/failing to ring), but honestly these are such a good price, so I keep buying them. A lot of the caregivers that come to our house have asked where I got them. If you are looking for a classy or elegant doorbell, this isn't it. If you're looking for one with a classy sound, this isn't it, either. If you just want something well priced with many tones that is very loud, then buy this. Although it is unfortunate you can't just have one speaker for multiple doorbells, the speaker is quite loud so even though the speakers are in different parts of the house, you can hear all of them everywhere. There is also no volume control, so be advised. Interestingly, some of the doorbells ring more than one speaker, others don't. Probably a defect, but it works out for my family. The ring tones range from just a ding dong to a long section of loudly played fur elise.

Reviews.Title: Ghostly doorbell
Reviews.Author: Daniel Cesark
Reviews.Content: I rate the doorbell minus 0 star but they made me mark 1,  But I don't lie so it is below 0.If you would like to go nuts then this is the product made for you!  I highly recommend it.  For example, it rings all by itself which is great if you don't have any friends.  You won't feel alone or get bored.  And the people that you are conducting business with on the phone will think you are very popular because it rings maybe (If you are blessed) 15 times a day and I know it's not my service dog playing tricks on me because he retired and I live alone.  That is I think I do!!!!!!Seriously, this is the worst product I have every bought in my entire life.  Please do not buy this, it will drive you insane.

Reviews.Title: Good... for the first few months
Reviews.Author: Ruben Misrahi
Reviews.Content: It worked great... for the first few months.It's so cheap it's not worth spending the time calling for a refund, but I thought I'd benefit others by stating what my experience was.For the record I put new batteries, and nothing.Update: 12/30/2013Sorry, I changed the batteries again and now it works. Sorry for the impulsive criticism. When we make a mistake we should have the honesty of correcting it.

Reviews.Title: I wouldn't
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Elterman "michael l. elterman"
Reviews.Content: Love the ring but doesn't reliably work.  This is the second one I have received and it is inexpensive.  I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT-GREAT VALUE
Reviews.Author: Joseph Reckinger
Reviews.Content: THERE IS ACTUALLY MORE THAN 10 TONES AND SONGS ON THIS DOORBELL. THERE IS ALSO 3 VOLUME LEVELS THAT MAKE IT HEARD ANYWHERE IN YOUR HOME.

Reviews.Title: It'll Do
Reviews.Author: BearPup
Reviews.Content: As others have opined, the sound is not the sound of brass chimes; but it'll do OK. Some of the sounds are more grating than others, but there are some that are usable enough. I live in a smallish apartment, and even the low setting is a bit on the loud side, but overall, it'll do.

Reviews.Title: Needs better instructions
Reviews.Author: Tulsa666
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery but I found it VERY hard to insert the battery in the remote....NO instructions were included except " install the included battery" but not on how to open it up.

Reviews.Title: Nice selection of chimes
Reviews.Author: Rosella Witmer
Reviews.Content: I needed to replace a doorbell. A few positives and a few negatives. + This one was a good price. + There are some short chime selections. + Another plus was ease of installation.- It does seem to be made really cheaply, but it's been working well now for over a month.  - A few of the chimes selections are really lengthy - like several minutes, which to me is way too long for a doorbell to chime. - One thing that was not mentioned in the description was that it needs to be out of direct sun and rain.  For most doors this will be an issue.  It is for ours. Though there is a small overhang, it will get wet when it rains if there is any wind whatsoever.  And yes the sun hits it directly. Doorbells are on outside doors, so they should be made to withstand the elements.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: carolyn westbrook
Reviews.Content: Does work at all!!! Total waste of money. Button sticks. You push it nothing happens.if I didn't have to pay for shipping I'd send it back

Reviews.Title: Rarely works
Reviews.Author: Nick Schrandt
Reviews.Content: I have had nothing but grief with this doorbell. While the sound options are good (there are well over 10 of them) and the volume setting is nice, none of this matters when it doesn't work when pressed. At first I hung it in my hallway where the old doorbell had been and it refused to chime there and we assumed it had something to do with the electric wires in the wall. I moved it, and for a few days, it worked fine. Now, if the chime is stationary for any length of time, it doesn't work. The only way to get it to receive the signal is if I move it around. I've tried putting it all over the house, including directly next to the front door and have had the same results. Not sure what the problem is, but it's very frustrating. Cheap alarm, and I got what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: Don't use it with FDL White Cordless Remote Wireless Control Chime Door Bell at same building
Reviews.Author: Grace Chen
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit for my rental property. When I push the door bell, next door unit door bell rings. The next door door bell is FDL White Cordless Remote Wireless Control Chime Door Bell, I ordered from Amazon also. Although they look different, and model are different, but inside design is the same. They are made by same company. You can't use both model in the same building.

Reviews.Title: I adore this doorbell
Reviews.Author: Jenna of the Jungle
Reviews.Content: Now when people ring my bell, I hear the tune to "Rhythm of the Rain." ("Listen to the rhythm of the falling rain...") There are 38 different tunes-- there's bound to be one you like! Several are Christmas songs, one is Happy Birthday, a few are the standard ding-dong types (along with a Chinese woman saying, 'Hallo?'-- that one makes me laugh). It's loud, even on the quietest setting, and I've had no problems with installation or range.I accidentally ordered this one with the batteries when I meant to order the plug-in version, so, considering the price, I went ahead and bought the plug-in one, too. I found that the sound quality was better on the battery one. The plug-in one is still okay, but it always sounds slightly out of tune, whereas the battery one is clear and downright cheerful. One of my favorite purchases in a long time. I feel happy every time the bell rings!You can also remove the paper that says "Door Bell," which I did because I thought the little graphic was cheesy.

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected based on previous reviews.
Reviews.Author: Wes Embry
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install but you might need a drill to use a screwif the velcro that is included doesn't work  for your installation.We have a large three story house and the alarm is loud enoughto hear it everywhere. There are many choices for melodies.There is a one page instruction sheet, with a few things left outlike opening up the case for installation - I used a little screwdriverto open it up.A great value.

Reviews.Title: No More Yelling!
Reviews.Author: T. Hough
Reviews.Content: We bought two of these to put in our kids' bedrooms to "ring" them for meals and such when they are in their rooms distracted by electronics or friends, and no amount of yelling up the stairs can get their attention.  The units are plastic, loud (even on "low"), and, yes, the tones are annoying and "tinny" sounding, but the kids liked choosing their own tone, and "Happy Birthday" and several Christmas tunes are available to change things up in the future.  My concern when ordering these--since they do not have a "band" switch--was that both units would be operated by ONE doorbell button.  This is not the case.  Each unit--ringer and doorbell--have a UPC-like code sticker on them (instructions indicated to make sure the stickers matched each other)--and, fortunately or by design, our two units had different codes on them, so I can ring my son's room without also activating the chimes in my girls' room and vice versa.  Both the ringer and the doorbell operate on batteries that are accessed by opening the BACK of the units, so I used 3M double-stick mounting tape on the BOTTOM of the ringer and propped/stuck the unit on top of the wooden molding on each kids' closet--I didn't want to have to drill holes to hang the unit, and I didn't want to use mounting tape on the back of the unit which I would need to remove from the wall and risk damaging the wall when the batteries needed replaced.  Overall, even only having the units for a little over a week, we love them, and even if they only last a year, I would probably buy replacements ever year at this price--the peace of not having to yell is worth it, and the kids love it when they get an opportunity to "ring" for their brother or sister. Lastly, our doorbell buttons are hung in our 1st floor kitchen and the ringers/chimes are pretty much directly overhead on the 2nd floor, so I cannot speak much to range.  Both the blue doorbell button light up as well as a little green rectangle light on the ringer when activated (but the little green light will probably not get anyone's attention unless they are looking directly at it when it's rung--however, again, the chimes are loud--realizing that we are only looking to "ring" one room and not an entire house).  I also do not believe you would want to install the doorbell on an exterior surface, unless it is VERY protected from weather.  These units are cheap, but work exactly as we hoped they would.

Reviews.Title: Way more than 10 chimes!
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: Love this little door bell.  I purchased two, one specifically to "call" my kids upstairs from the playroom (haven't opened the other yet.)  It is super loud, even on the lowest volume.  I considered putting some sound dampening over the speaker, but ended up putting it inside a china cabinet that's down there.  It's perfect.  We have it set to randomly choose a chime every time I hit the button from upstairs.  It also has a green light that flashes when the chime is going. The range is great! It has WAY more than 10 chimes...at least 25.  I can't speak to durability yet, but will update my review after a few months.

Reviews.Title: doorbell works but annoying
Reviews.Author: Harold T. Newkom "Newkom"
Reviews.Content: using this for my classroom. Keeping door locked these days. After Sandy Hook shootings we are more protective of our students.

Reviews.Title: works for me, very loud if you want it to be
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Mine came with instructions and a battery for the button unit. You provide three AAs for the indoor part. I have a very small shotgun-style wooden house, so i didn't expect any interference with the signal and there isn't any.I like the little clear cover for the label that you can customize with your name, or house number.  The number of songs besides a standard door bell is outstanding, I cycled through them but kept the original ding-dong that repeats once.The button unit is big compared to most doorbell buttons, the blue part about the size of a quarter. If you are looking for something to blend in with the surroundings..this isn't it.  If you are looking for something that would be hard to miss..get this one.

Reviews.Title: Cute and loud
Reviews.Author: Whispering Willow "Nichole Wilde"
Reviews.Content: I was thinking when I bought this unit that it was going to not be loud enough but I was totally wrong.  It is loud and works great.  No wireing needed just put in the batteries and I used velcro to put it on the wall and on the outside for easy battery replacement.  Batteries last a long time.  Make sure if you live a in cold climate to get the lithum batteries so the cold don't zap your battery.

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: DMS
Reviews.Content: The button on the transmitter didn't activate the receiver (and I'm sure the batteries were properly installed because the button on the transmitter would light up, and the receiver would sound when I manually cycled through the chimes). Also, the instructions were very poor, and a few of the images in the series of pictorial instructions were covered by a sticker that couldn't be easily removed. I'm returning the product for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Cute, fun, really works great 2nd post.
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: 2nd post update.  I have started a trend lol  so far have ordered 2 more, and will be ordering another 6 tonite because so many people in the complex love the different tunes and the fact that - on low- it can be heard clearly in a 2 bedroom.I live in an apt complex where we can't put up anything permanent.  This is perfect because sticky stuff comes away from the wall cleanly outside my apt.  Inside, there are small screws you can use to attach to wall, or a hole you can just hang it on a hook with!  There were some cheaper products but Voye has a good rep so I think I got a good deal.  The instructions are printed clearly on the package and it was fun to listen to all the tunes before picking the one I wanted (old kentucy home).

Reviews.Title: This thing is hysterical!!! :)
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: Love this thing!  So incredibly easy to install, & SO many sound choices!  Everyone that comes over loves to hear it!  SOOO FUN!  And for the price?!?  Crazy to buy anything else!

Reviews.Title: Doorbell
Reviews.Author: toots
Reviews.Content: Works well. YOu can choose between different sounds and no matter where in the house you mount it be sure to know you will definitely hear

Reviews.Title: Great remote door bell.
Reviews.Author: S. Mock "Luv2Teach"
Reviews.Content: This is a great remote door bell, the only problem I have with it is picking the sound to use.  There are so many choices.

Reviews.Title: An attention getter!
Reviews.Author: traebabe "TJ"
Reviews.Content: I live a big apartment and sometimes don't hear anyone knocking.  It's useful especially when I'm shopping by mail and can't hear the delivery guy,  Three volume levels.  I keep it on mid level because the highest is too loud for me.  I love it and I deeply recommend it,

Reviews.Title: Well It Works.
Reviews.Author: Ron M. Kolman "Subtext"
Reviews.Content: The thing works. Button on exterior of house (though product warns to avoid 'rain' (?)...will make the hideous selection of "chimes" go off signaling a visitor. There is a tinny/cheap chime for every holiday imaginable, Greensleeves I believe, and several others likely germane in the orient. There is a "doorbell" sound (one), but the "ding-dong" is followed by chatter of children laughing. If you can live with that (we are - it's a joke in our home now), and can keep rain from direct access to exterior buzzer (apply device in a recessed area, not likely to get brunt of a down pour, the doorbell works. Fairly loud, can be heard through house, and distance from transmitter to receiver is rather good. With these things in mind...and as I've previously said, the thing works and not badly at all.UPDATE: My experience...product will last about 8 months, perhaps a year and outdoor transmitter will fail, water-logged. Keep this out of the elements as best you can. Tape over and around the seam for battery replacement to extend life.This time went with Honeywell (here on Amazon) and am very happy ([...]

Reviews.Title: 2 strikes and you are out!
Reviews.Author: ace
Reviews.Content: I ordered and received the Voye wireless door bell, installed batteries in the transmitter and ringer, and nothing. The ringer would not work. Returned and asked for a replacement and the replacement would not work. I give up :) Will order another brand this time.

Reviews.Title: Perfect solution for near-deaf seniors
Reviews.Author: Alicia Hogan "Granny of 6"
Reviews.Content: I chose it because it's portable and was super easy to install.  Visitors ring it first because the button catches their eye first.  I have a wired bell and another battery operated bell for my bedroom.  If I'd seen this one first, I wouldn't have needed the expensive one I bought for my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Versatile
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "George"
Reviews.Content: I bought this bell for my mom.  She's elderly and requires help for most things.  Having a button you only need to press and then someone comes to assist you is great.  I can take the bell around the house and even outside and it will still ring when I'm needed.  The sound is adjustable, but it can ring quite loud.The hardest thing is to take off the cover of the button to put in the battery.  When you give up trying to pry it apart and read the instructions, you'll find that a flat-head screwdriver should be used.  Unfortunately, I just couldn't find one, but I MacGyvered it with one of the prongs of a cellphone charger plug.

Reviews.Title: Signal Strength
Reviews.Author: Michael de la Garza
Reviews.Content: Not as powerful as I thought and its distance from transmitter to receiver is actually shorter than advertised.  The must be NO obstacles between the two, which precludes the transmitter being on the other side of a door or between walls.

Reviews.Title: Missing 12volt battery for button
Reviews.Author: AQ
Reviews.Content: Just got this in the mail, the 12volt battery is missing. I would change this to 3 stars if I can get a battery for the button. The bell is nice and loud from trying the different settings on the chime although the sound quality is not the greatest...

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Item at a VERY reasonable price!!!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca A. Barto "Reba"
Reviews.Content: Great item for the money. Play a lot more songs than advertised! I have one for the front door and one for the back door! They work better than the one I replaced that I paid twice as much for!!!

Reviews.Title: Don't bother...
Reviews.Author: CopyliciousSF "CopyliciousSF"
Reviews.Content: This did not work for me. The back of the bell didn't open with much effort and the other part was too loud on the lowest setting when testing chimes. Returned.

Reviews.Title: good . i am happy with it.
Reviews.Author: Yun
Reviews.Content: very nice looking doorbell. it is loud enough. and it is easy to set up and install. there are so many song chimes, so many christmas songs. but i only like the ding dong chime.

Reviews.Title: Does what it's supposed to.
Reviews.Author: M J. P
Reviews.Content: It does the job but not so well if you use it on metal doors, otherwise, it's ok. Selectable volume and some nice tones, some obnoxious ones.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: JennyF
Reviews.Content: This product is Horrible. It stopped working after a month. I do not recommend this to anyone as a doorbell.

Reviews.Title: Very poor distance
Reviews.Author: cmoisuperlea
Reviews.Content: I had this doorbell set up roughly 15 feet away from the door and it wouldn't work properly.  You would have to press the doorbell about 10 times to get it to finally ring.  I moved the receiver about two feet away from the doorbell, literally on the other side of the door, and now it works fine.  The only trouble is that I need the sound carry far and would really need to set it up so that the speaker/receiver is about 15 feet away from the doorbell.  Big Fail!

Reviews.Title: Just what we needed!
Reviews.Author: Working Mom
Reviews.Content: Work in a clinic where the nurses are always moving and the ward clerk is also on the move.  This device allows us to be in rooms with patients and still be able to know when someone arrive at reception. Reduces patients wait time

Reviews.Title: Use as emergency alert for elderly parent
Reviews.Author: John Becker
Reviews.Content: We needed a way for my elderly father to alert us at night if he needs something. Walkie talkies too complicated. Baby monitor did not allow us any sleep, listening all night. With this doorbell dad can alert us. It has been needed several times, we now have peace of mind that dad is okay at night.

Reviews.Title: great compact doorbell
Reviews.Author: Sonwan12
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my friends who moved into a new house without a doorbell. They love it.  It actually has over 20 different chimes to listen to. So you can change the ring for the seasons.  The only draw back, that I see, is that if you like a particular ring, and want to keep that one for your ring,  you have to listen to all the other sounds, in order to get back to the ring you like. Can be frustrating.  But overall, its a great compact product that can't be beat for the cost and fast delivery. And wirelesss makes it a breeze to just stick on you door,  and put the ringer anywhere on a shelf, etc.

Reviews.Title: Voye 72-20488 Wireless Remote Control Doorbell with 10 Different Chimes
Reviews.Author: Gina Chaney "Gmchaney"
Reviews.Content: I needed a remote control door bell for my door going into the house from the garage. I like how it has 3 settings for low, med and high for volume. It works well! Now when someone comes to my home and come in through the garage, I can always hear them when they arrive. It has Christmas ring tones, a birthday ring tone and several classical ring tones.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping, product as described
Reviews.Author: lulu "A free spirited dynamic and blessed wom...
Reviews.Content: It works, lovely wrapped, fastly shipped, what else can you ask for? Highly recommended. I would buy again soon for mom and sis! Their bells don't work well.

Reviews.Title: Instructions/Review
Reviews.Author: NightWolf5829
Reviews.Content: **For those of you trying to figure out how to put the battery in the doorbell**Get a butter knife wedge it between the hairline cracks of the back of the doorbell. Slowly pry with the butter knife to detach back of the doorbell. Then place small battery that was included on the bottom. Can't miss it.I agree that this doorbell was poorly made. Horrible music, only 2 worth using if you ask me. Vague instructions, was trying to figure out how to open it without breaking it for like 15 minutes. For my purpose, just wanted to use it so people wouldn't have to knock to get my attention upstairs. So I wasn't looking for quality. If you want quality, this definitely isn't for you. If you want something that grabs attention cheaply, this product could be for you.

Reviews.Title: It is what it is...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Big houses need doorbells, so this is  great in a pinch.  Battery operated on both ends, so set up is fairly easy.  The tones are, well, okay...there was only one or two that we actually liked, or that was loud enough to hear throughout the house.  It works and we can hear it, which is the important part.On a side note, this product is made in China.  Amazon, if you see this, it would be great for you to list where products are being imported from.  We always scan for this information, and do our best to buy made in the USA first, and foremost.

Reviews.Title: ugly doorbell but works well for the money
Reviews.Author: bill
Reviews.Content: Hard to believe someone would be stupid enough to need the word doorbell under the button. I guess you could turn the paper over and write in your last name or some other helpful info. The volume can be turned up really high and the range is much better than comparable products. Regarding the 10 chimes, there is really only one that is even tolerable. The rest are shockingly bad including one supposed chime that are just words in a foreign language (probably some variant of Chinese).  Still, the price is right.

Reviews.Title: Phil's Review of Voye 72-20488 Wireless Remote Control Doorbell
Reviews.Author: Phillip E
Reviews.Content: Yes, we received this little item today and we Just love it.It is very loud and has 10 different chimes and they are for the mostpart ALL very loud, which is what we wanted.  We already purchased anice Wireless Doorbell by Honeywell from Amazon so we are not using thisVoye Doorbell for that purpose. As my wife broke her hip about a year agoshe gets around using a walker and as she spends a lot of time in the living roomreading her AMAZON Kindle E book and enjoying it very much and I spend a lotof time in the "Computer" room as we call it, we sometimes have difficulty hearingone another from the distance.  We have also some two way radios we got from AMAZONbut sometimes the batteries will be weak just when you need them and need to be replacedwith the Amazon Basic Rechargeble batteries, so therefore, in that situation she needs onlyto press the little blue button on this product and the bell goes off in the computer room where Iam and I hear it LOUD AND CLEAR!!!  or wherever I am as it is quite portable.  Thanks Amazonfor everything and all the things that You offer.  I would recommend this and all the other manyitems we have purchased from Amazon.Sincerely,  Phillip E. Haddock  Pauls Valley, OK

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: yakuza1329
Reviews.Content: Have the button downstairs and the speaker on the second floor. Have it on medium setting and it's perfect. (One more word. Happy Amazon?)

Reviews.Title: Work well
Reviews.Author: Becky G
Reviews.Content: Our doorbell does not get used a ton, but these work well enough for our needs. The ring tone is not as rich and clear as we would like, but really didn't have high expectations for the price we paid. They work fine for us.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Robindranath Maharaj
Reviews.Content: Installed easily, and works great. Different tones to choose from. Button is easily seen , doorbell isn't small at all.

Reviews.Title: It died about 3 months using it
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: I purchased this door bell in Sep. 3rd 2012. It is pretty loud for what it does with different sounds to select from. However, it died on me today 11/24, 2012. So, I decided to write a brief review to inform buyer out there to know that you might think you are getting a good door bell for the price, but I am in need of buying a new one after 3 months of using it which it is going to cause me more. Why not buy a little better decent one and elminite the headache of taking it down, spending time and money to buy a new one? Thanks for reading!

Reviews.Title: A Decent Bell
Reviews.Author: Naveen Nayak
Reviews.Content: Pros:A decent bell for the pricethe range is pretty goodi put the bell switch outside my apartment entrance and the bell operates inside my bedroom ( a total of 3 brick walls in between )has 3 sound settings ( low, medium and high ) and a couple of ring choicesCons:Cheap Plastic ( expected )Would like to have a bigger flashing light on the receiver for a visual queue ( just in case i am wearing my headphones or am gaming with very loud music )

Reviews.Title: At $10 it deserves a 5 star rating
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: This doorbell works and it is wireless!  Very convenient. Since it only cost $10, I wasn't expecting perfection but it is very functional. I wouldn't hesitate to buy it if you are looking for a reliable product at an exceptional price.***Update*** It has been over 4 months and it is still ringing! I am telling you for $10, it is a nobrainer!***

Reviews.Title: Remote door bell
Reviews.Author: Neil Lewis
Reviews.Content: Tricky to put in the battery.It did the job and the price is right.I would give it 5 stars.Nothing else to say.

Reviews.Title: Range more like 250cm
Reviews.Author: Seth
Reviews.Content: Received this as a gift.Installed on a side door that I can't hear knocking from, but if I place the receiver outside of the room with the door, it no longer receives the signal. Somewhat defeating the purpose. After a few months the range has decreased to perhaps 18 inches with complete line of sight.

Reviews.Title: DING DONG!!!
Reviews.Author: romer412
Reviews.Content: This little thing is great! our "visitors" used to have to call from their cell phones from the driveway , now they don't!  Trademark Global 72-20488 Wireless Remote Control Doorbell W/ 8 Different Chimes

Reviews.Title: Great product for price.
Reviews.Author: trin miele
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grandmother so she could wake someone if she needed anything. It worked great. It was never actually outside though, so I can't say whether it would hold up well in the weather. 3 volume settings, and several tunes to choose from are nice. Simple to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Doorbell
Reviews.Author: J. L. Martin "txhillcountry"
Reviews.Content: Besides the price, the other think I really liked about this doorbell was the 10 options for the chime and it's done well being used away from the house at our gate.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: howard jamrs
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. Works perfect and excellent range and battery life as well. Wish I would of got more on my order. Also good speed on shipping.

Reviews.Title: Love the chimes!
Reviews.Author: Bevz L.
Reviews.Content: We had a doorbell installed before where the sound it made drove me nuts every time. It was loud and screechy. This product however, is sweet and doesn’t make me jump every time someone was at the door which is fairly often.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: C. S.
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised this works as well as it does for the price.  I had to jury rig the old doorbell holes to get it to stay outside, and it does not claim to be water proof, but so far the remote has not failed even here in rainy Florida.  The default first tone is the only one tolerable but it is better than re-wiring everything and trying to find the right ones in the attic.  Definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great door bell
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Wolper
Reviews.Content: Excellent! Easy to hear easy to use . I bought it for my mother who can't hear very well . It solved the problem.

Reviews.Title: Great door bell
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Most door bells go out when the rain hits them.  This dose not it works great.  Long battery life. Great!

Reviews.Title: door bell ring ring.
Reviews.Author: Keil F. Nitz
Reviews.Content: so far no complaints.  its got a great variety of different ringers, ours is set to random so you never know what will happen.  push button, make noise.  works as it should.

Reviews.Title: Works quite well
Reviews.Author: Alan B. Taplow
Reviews.Content: My wife is an invalid and is unable to talk, so I use this so she can signal when she needs something. I attached a magnet to the back so it won't fall off the table attached to her wheel chair.  Some of the tunes are a bit long, but there is enough to choose from to find one which doesn't drive you crazy :-)  Actually, I think there are more than 10 tunes --- I never did get to cycle thru them all.

Reviews.Title: Ding Dong.....Avon calling!
Reviews.Author: Karla S. Howard "karmakorn62"
Reviews.Content: These little contraptions are great!  If you don't have a doorbell and no money or motivation to call an electrician to hook one up, I recommend getting one or two or three of these!I purchased one about 3 yrs. ago for my brother who lives in an upstairs apartment.  I don't wanna' go up the stairs and bang on his door to get him to come out (I pick him up as he works for/with me)  so he just hooked this up and I keep the remote thingy in my car.  I pull up and press the button (sometimes I press it a whole bunch just to bug him!) .  It has worked for 3 yrs. and hasn't defaulted at all.  I was super surprised because the price is so reasonable and I just didn't think it would last.I ordered this last one for my parents who also pick him up on occassion and I didn't want my dad climbing the rickety stairs to get him.  It works very well too.  And it has a slightly different tone, so my brother can tell who's coming to get him.I would recommend this item.  It would also be fun for a teens room; a rec room; maybe a business.

Reviews.Title: It's great!
Reviews.Author: ITSONLYJC
Reviews.Content: It's great! It registers from a good distance, you can hear it loud and clear, and it offers a vast amount of tones! It's also very simple to setup and use. What more could you ask for at that price.

Reviews.Title: Battery design is not the best
Reviews.Author: Tim ring
Reviews.Content: The battery design is convenient, but the batteries don't last very long. After a few months it stopped working entirely.

Reviews.Title: Remote control Doorbell
Reviews.Author: Mary A. Smith
Reviews.Content: I would definitely recommend this doorbell. works great, battery operated, very loud chime. and the price is awesome! I plan on buying a couple of more, just so I'll have some spares.

Reviews.Title: Super
Reviews.Author: Janetskid
Reviews.Content: This product is just what I wanted.  I was easy to install. Easy for friends and deliveries.  Great ring tone.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: nettie Aloma Kennedy
Reviews.Content: Just what I needed for this building. Telling others about it and showing how easy to get one for themselves.

Reviews.Title: For the price, it's ok.
Reviews.Author: Particia Watson
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure if the battery on the transmitter is nearly dead, or it honestly has such a short range I have to keep both pieces within inches of each other, literally. I could hang the receiver on the inside of the door and the transmitter on the outside, but that would require drilling holes in the door. Yea, that is not happening. It will do until I can get a replacement battery to see if that is the issue. If it isn't, I will buy a better quality door chime/bell. Disappointing. If a new battery will make it so the receiver can be moved to the center of the apartment, then it will be a good purchase. We shall see. I will update my review if that is the issue.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Caprice
Reviews.Content: Does exactly what it states it would do.  The button gets stuck from time to time, but living in a split level condo it is so help. No more missed guest.  Arrive din a timely manner.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great wireless doorbell
Reviews.Author: Kool "frank"
Reviews.Content: Initially I tried rechargeable batteries with 1.28 volts. The doorbell did not work. Replaced with 1.5 volt batteries and the doorbell worked great

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: bjorkyou
Reviews.Content: Love the product.  Does what it was designed to do.  The price was great.  I would buy again and I would recommend to all.

Reviews.Title: weak wireless bandwidth
Reviews.Author: Keita S.
Reviews.Content: this product is supposed to be "wireless remote control", but the fact is the switch doesn't work unless you place the switch and doorbell device almost next to each other, which makes no point for the "wireless." I would not suggest you buy this product for that reason.

Reviews.Title: piece of garbage
Reviews.Author: Christine Kubert
Reviews.Content: It wasn't shipped in the original Voye Shrink wrap package - it was sent in one box but 2 pieces wrapped in bubble wrap.  It worked, it didn't work, it worked, it didn't work, it didn't work, it worked, it didn't work........I kept moving the chime box closer & closer and when the chime box and doorbell button were within 6 feet of each other it worked just fine --- 6 feet and 1 inch away and it didn't work -- my apartment is only 692 sq feet. It's a piece of crap - I sent it back for a refund.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: khalid labadi
Reviews.Content: great piece of music, has more than 25 sounds, u can place it anywhere and also u can control it from more than 50 feet

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Pat A. Breaux "Pat"
Reviews.Content: I was a little suspicious of it meeting the claims made in the description. But it works just like it has been claimed. I was able to select one of the available ring tones.

Reviews.Title: Too many chimes
Reviews.Author: Kelly K Johnson
Reviews.Content: Even though it has made chimes, they played to long and there was not one that just had one or two rings to it.

Reviews.Title: so loud
Reviews.Author: Debster
Reviews.Content: It comes with lo med and hi settings but even the low is pretty loud. there are a few normal bell type tones but the rest of melodies. Lullaby, happy birthday, christmas tune .. piano songs . A great variety of choices. I bought this  as a cheap alternative to an intercom so i dont mind the non-bell choices

Reviews.Title: Doorchime
Reviews.Author: Jan Dunlap
Reviews.Content: Great little doorbell.  The only problem I've found is that mine and my neighbor's (70 feet away) are on the same circuit.  That means that every time someone rings her doorbell mine also rings, and when my bell is rung, hers rings too.  A lot of bells going off around here!  Would be great if we knew how to correct the problem, but that's not covered in their minimal instructions.

Reviews.Title: Good product.
Reviews.Author: Azadur R. Khan
Reviews.Content: I have been using this product for more than a month. It met my expectations. Over all, its good in all respect.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work after 3 months outside on a covered porch
Reviews.Author: SouthernWV
Reviews.Content: Very cheaply made.  After 3 months outside, it quit working.  I changed batteries, but it didn't help.  I guess it's time for a new one.  Junk!

Reviews.Title: Value for money
Reviews.Author: Salil Suresh Joshi "Salil"
Reviews.Content: Good one.. Working as expected.  Easy to install. Option of fastning or sticking the outdoor unit. Many ring tones to choose.

Reviews.Title: Great value! Wish there more standard tones.
Reviews.Author: larry130
Reviews.Content: Delivery was great! Two day service. For the price, the item was very good! Didn't expect such good quality. Sound is very good, so is volume. The only problem I had was the lack of simple doorbell rings. There were very many selections, but most were very long and could be annoying. If there were a few standard shorts rings, this would be an excellent product.

Reviews.Author: klw
Reviews.Content: THis is an AHmazing product!!! Details say that there is 10 chimes, I was surprised that there are a LOT more than that! A lot of different chimes to choose from. I bought 3,one for each door...all with different chimes so we know which door to go to

Reviews.Title: stopped working after 4 months
Reviews.Author: Lovejoy "tr"
Reviews.Content: stopped working after about 4 months therefore past the deadline time to return for a refund. Don't waste you money on this.

Reviews.Title: Obviously I received a unit that had been returned.  It didn't last long.  A rip off.
Reviews.Author: K Dacha
Reviews.Content: I received this remote doorbell in packaging that was NOT original, even though it was listed as being "New."  The doorbell receiver and the actual doorbell (blue button) were wrapped poorly in old bubble wrap and put into a box that approximated the size of the unit.  There was a folded page of instruction.  But it was so obvious that this had been returned, and the marketplace seller just wanted to unload it to another sucker.  Very disappointing, especially because the unit no longer works (it worked for about two weeks; I changed the batteries, ensured that the call button was situated very nearby, but to no improvement.)  So buyer beware, especially when it comes from a marketplace seller that doesn't send the product in original packaging in any form.

Reviews.Title: Love the different chimes
Reviews.Author: danijade
Reviews.Content: We love the different chimes. The birthday chime for when there is a birthday party, the Christmas chime during Christmas and the ding-dong hello chime for the rest of the year. It's loud, super easy to install and not needed to be plugged to an AC outlet as it is on battery power only. But that should last awhile as it hardly being used. This just works perfect for us.

Reviews.Title: about for doorbel
Reviews.Author: Ngoc A.
Reviews.Content: It very good for door when  it is wireless. I use it for my car when my car return . I like it

Reviews.Title: Doorbell did not work
Reviews.Author: Henry J Casparius
Reviews.Content: I went out and bought new batteries for this item and after hooking everything up and attaching to my front door frame, when I pushed the button the doorbell did not ring. If I pushed it 10 times, it may ring once if that.

Reviews.Title: Not bad, but could be better...
Reviews.Author: Dima Bilan
Reviews.Content: Doesn't work at 20 ft distance and through 2 doors, so I  had to hang it right above the entrance door- cause otherwise I didn't want to function. The ring button falls in sometimes, and I had to take the batteries off to stop it from ringing. When it's too cold outside- the button freezes and doesn't function at all until it has been in a warm place for a day or two.... But, overall it's not a bad product for such a low price.

Reviews.Title: We use it for elderly assistance
Reviews.Author: Samuel P. Monteon
Reviews.Content: My grandmother recently moved in with us due to health issues. She's 79 and has many health problems and I take care of her. In a 2 story house, though, I can't always be with her, and she has trouble working phones and walkie talkies. I purchased this so that she can press a simple single button to call me downstairs if she needs anything. It works great so far, and it has multiple alarm choices to choose from as well as a low, medium and high volume adjustment setting. You do need 3 AA batteries, but the button comes with a single battery. This is completely wireless. Just install batteries and put it where you want it. It also comes with screws and a sticky pad to stick it somewhere. I'm reviewing this after recently receiving it, but if anything changes over the course of time I'm using it, I'll update my review.As of now, I would recommend this product.  Don't go and spend 40 bucks for a home care call button. This works just great and does exactly the same thing for a quarter the price.

Reviews.Title: Simple and inexpensive
Reviews.Author: wiseGuy
Reviews.Content: Had to add another push button, and the job of wiring was daunting.  This made it easy.  It has a fair number of different chimes to choose from, too.

Reviews.Title: Cool sounds poor range
Reviews.Author: Radius
Reviews.Content: The sounds this puts out are wacky cool. But the range didn't cut the mustard. I ended up returning it.

Reviews.Title: It's wonderful!!!
Reviews.Author: Gr8
Reviews.Content: Small and mighty--a very nice product and extremely user friendly. The ring tones are surprisingly delightful. So nice I would buy two.

Reviews.Title: wireless doorbell
Reviews.Author: Iris
Reviews.Content: Love the easy install.  10 different chimes are easy to set just push one little button - love it!  Even has sound volume.  I set it on medium and it works perfect

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Mr. Ronald Weaver
Reviews.Content: Works great . Was a just what I needed no problem with it.Price was right .Easy to use would buy more if and when I need them.

Reviews.Title: woot bell for annoying unwanted people lol
Reviews.Author: ARIA
Reviews.Content: bought it cuz i moved from nyc to nc and i notice down here they love to knock on your doors which to me is very rude and annoying so i bought this bell and its very nice love the tones good price now i just need to get a sighn so the dummies out here will start using the bell smh lol love the bell tho would recommend it to anyone who needs one

Reviews.Title: DING!!!! DONG!!!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan P. Mendoza
Reviews.Content: there are way more than 10 chimes... the chineese greeting is interesting....  takes a while to get back to the original chime if the button gets puched.  It is loud though, if you are looking for something easy to hear across a room.

Reviews.Title: VOYE 72-20488 WIRELESS DOORBELL
Reviews.Author: Dr. C. Bradenton "dr. c"
Reviews.Content: It works just fine. We can hear it anywhere in the house. It was easy to install. Inexpensive. GOOD BUY.

Reviews.Title: Yuk!
Reviews.Author: MG
Reviews.Content: Stopped working in less than 6 weeks. Obviously the door bell ringer itself is not meant to be placed outdoors in wet weather. If the ringer cannot be placed outdoors, then what good is it! Something the Mfg. should have listed in the product description. Junk!

Reviews.Title: Strange ring tones
Reviews.Author: Nace McAdams
Reviews.Content: I purchased this door bell several months ago. I did not like the choices of rings, as stated in another review the ding dong was followed by a foreign language comment.  This thing ate batteries and was unreliable. this morning I came out to hear an annoying sound which was coming from the receiver just low enough to make it hard to tell where it was coming from. You get what you pay for and I guess its true. Pulled out the battery's and started looking for a new doorbell, lesson learned.

Reviews.Title: Good doorbell
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: The doorbell replaced a similar one that no longer worked. I can hear it all over the house. It is also easily identifiable to people coming to my house as a doorbell.

Reviews.Title: Sadley it didn't work for my :(
Reviews.Author: Kelly Bast
Reviews.Content: I so wanted to love this doorbell, but have had it 2 weeks and it only works 1 out of every 5 times.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Product
Reviews.Author: Gambino
Reviews.Content: Ordered 2 Units back to back.So the first order came in and the receiver didn't work at all. It lit up with a nice little LED display but didn't do anything else. Ordered another unit and the same thing happened! All I wanted was a reasonably priced door bell so I would not keep missing packages or not be able to hear guests knocking on my metal screen door and they failed me!

Reviews.Title: Definitely get this!
Reviews.Author: kayjee
Reviews.Content: I live on the first floor of an apartment building. I put this just outside the foyer door of the building and it works! Lots of tunes, most are unnecessary and cheesy but for the price, this is worth it!

Reviews.Title: "Wireless" Remote very happy with product.
Reviews.Author: pjames
Reviews.Content: I like the fact that you can carry the remote where ever you are.  When we are in the garage we can carry it with us and know when someone is at the front door.

Reviews.Title: Worked good for a minute!
Reviews.Author: Carol Dunn
Reviews.Content: This babe is a dud...at least the one we got. It worked wonderful for 3 months and then died! The bell will work once then stop. Work once again...then stop. Either we got a lemon or there is some sort of short in the system. Oh well...you get what  you pay for:)

Reviews.Title: Junk.
Reviews.Author: K. Andrews "Permanent tourist"
Reviews.Content: Nothing but problems with this thing.  First, someone else in our building evidently has the same chime, or else we had ghosts playing dong-dong-ditch with us.  So I went to change the jumper settings, and found that there are none!  So no way to change to a non-competing frequency.  That alone makes this thing junk, in my book.  But it gets worse.When pressed, the button can very easily stay depressed.  It's not obvious, so your visitor, even if he cared, wouldn't notice it.  When that happens, the bell doesn't keep ringing, but it does discharge the battery in the button (which is an expensive and not easy to find type).  This is not an anomaly, as I have seen that other reviewers reported the same problem.It does not come with instructions.  By itself, not a huge crime, since these things should be intuitive enough to figure out, but still, instructions would be nice!When the battery is not discharged, it rings loudly and has a lot of different options for sounds to play.  I'd prefer one that functions properly even if it only says "ding dong" and not clips from La Cucaracha, Happy Birthday, and Mozart.It is cheap and flimsy, but given the price, that could be forgiven if it functioned well otherwise.  But it does not.  It is not often that I think it is fair to give a product a one-star rating, but the problems with this one make it useless in a real world application, so one star it is!

Reviews.Title: Great doorbell
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: My husband can ring it as if he was in a hospital.....recently he fell and the doorbell is usually close (for him to reach). The door was closed but when he rang the doorbell I knew to check on him...No its nor an intercom but for the money it does the job.

Reviews.Title: wireless remote control doorbell
Reviews.Author: BIGMAC "BIGMAC"
Reviews.Content: This item is a piece of crap. When you push the door bell ringer 90% of the time it won't ring. You have to hit a specific spot on the control button for it too work. Sometimes it will and sometimes it won't. I don't recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Buy it for sounds
Reviews.Author: Eleazar Moncada
Reviews.Content: love unit, easily installs , my 10 year old did the instalation so easy, love changing the melodies,will not wear the batteries down too quickly good vlume too.

Reviews.Title: For special purpose
Reviews.Author: Elphy 2
Reviews.Content: I'm using this as a "call bell" for a family member who often needs help with personal needs.  Button in the bathroom and receiver in the living room.  I was a little concerned about the special 23V 12a battery but easily found it on Amazon from my favorite battery supplier and will get five of them cheaper than one of them locally.  The battery that was supplied will probably last a long time but nice to have backups on hand.

Reviews.Title: arrived broken
Reviews.Author: Cindi
Reviews.Content: Variety of chimes is nice.  It's loud enough to hear at a good distance.  The doorbell button was cracked upon arrival.  Not packaged well.

Reviews.Title: Doorbell is a great value
Reviews.Author: K. Moore
Reviews.Content: Nice selection of tones and easy to install.  It looks nice on my doorframe and rings clear and loud enough that I can hear it downstairs.

Reviews.Title: good doorbell
Reviews.Author: liljohn
Reviews.Content: its a good bell first one I messed up cuz it wouldn't stick to the wall of my house it kept falling off when people close the door or push the button. I had to replace it so I hope this one works better

Reviews.Title: This is worth it !!
Reviews.Author: Juanita
Reviews.Content: This was well worth the investment and I would recommend the product to others.  The only problem was the tape to mount the bell was not strong enough.

Reviews.Title: Simple and easy to operate, but strictly line of sight
Reviews.Author: R. W. Milyard "GearJunky"
Reviews.Content: It doesn't get any easier than this.Open up the sending unit (push button), put in the supplied battery.Open up the receiver (larger box that produces the sound), put in (3) AA batteries.Your done.The thought was to use this unit both in the house, or whatever garage I am workingin, so that I would be notified of a delivery at my front gate (I take up 2 acres).It was a great thought, but reality  set in when I realized the only way this thing wouldwork was to be able to see the receiver from the sending unit.Once the ground, or a wall got in the way, Nada!So it goes in the ever growing disappointment pile.

Reviews.Title: Great Doorbell
Reviews.Author: C
Reviews.Content: We're very pleased with this doorbell.  It has a number of different sounds. Good for the price. It's on the outside of our enclosed deck and we can hear just fine in the trailer.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as described - works perfectly!
Reviews.Author: J. Hopper
Reviews.Content: Purchased from Amazon and received in two days - Yea Prime!The unit comes with everything needed except 3 x AA batteries and a screw to mount the receiver (chime) unit. FYI: a standard drywall screw works fine. It took less than 5 minutes to install everything and it works and looks great!  I especially like the visual feedback when the button is pushed (button momentarily lights up blue).  I don't know why previous reviewer had trouble removing base of button for mounting. It's your common "insert screwdriver into slot to remove backplate" configuration - it seemed intuitive enough for me.I highly recommend this product to others. I have no regrets about this purchase.

Reviews.Title: door bell
Reviews.Author: S. Dicapo
Reviews.Content: excellent item. it is so helpful since i am hearing impaired. it is easy to take to different areas and still can be heard. it has several tones to go with the seasons. easy to set up with no extra tools.

Reviews.Title: What do you expect?
Reviews.Author: Dennis Johnson "Shopper"
Reviews.Content: This is about as cheap as they come. Yet it's simple to set up and install. And it works great.I've only had it a couple weeks, so I can't talk to its longevity, but so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Works Great for Me
Reviews.Author: Sassy Lady
Reviews.Content: I am more than pleased with my purchase of this wireless doorbell.  I hesitated to buy such an inexpensive item, but I thought I would give it a try.  It does everything I was looking for!  Very easy to install and get going. If I need to, I can carry the little chime box with me to anywhere in the house and always be sure I know someone is at my door.  No missed delivery packages for me! My home didn't have a doorbell when I moved in, and being a renter, I didn't want to spend a lot of money on one.  This was the perfect solution!

Reviews.Title: wireless doorbell
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and very loud, even with my hearing aids I have it on med. The button lights when you pust it, a very nice feature.

Reviews.Title: Bought two of them...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Nice, musical tunes, loud enough for me to hear! Can be turned softer or louder still. No need for instilation. It was easy to place the parts and I have been using them a few months now. Good purchase.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: greg
Reviews.Content: I was real happy to get this set up. Real easy to get going I just installed the batteries and hung it on the wall never will miss some one at my door again

Reviews.Title: has a bug
Reviews.Author: J. Pelham
Reviews.Content: every time someone rings the bell, the light doesnt go off and it keeps ringing and ringing al on top of each ring which is annoying

Reviews.Title: good on and loud
Reviews.Author: brenda
Reviews.Content: This device is worth the money, and works very well. The entire experience was not perfect, sort of aggravating actually, but after getting the back of the door bell open, it went very quickly. Someone with better common sense or who is more intuitive could have set it up in 5 minutes. Buy it, you won't go wrong

Reviews.Title: it works
Reviews.Author: shivymay
Reviews.Content: Its works well, only trouble is that you have to keep it relatively close by the area of the buzzer itself because when its out of range it doesn't work that well. Other than that. It does what its supposed to.

Reviews.Title: it works
Reviews.Author: marlon nicholas
Reviews.Content: great item, item was as described. item arrive on delivery as was promised...i love this doorbell, it came in ver useful at my new apartment. very loud with different chine tone settings, i also recommended it to a few of my friends.

Reviews.Title: Not very loud
Reviews.Author: C. Neumann
Reviews.Content: Works fine but not very loud. I hate the idea of just adding words to meet your stupid minimum. one

Reviews.Title: worked for few months
Reviews.Author: Rambo
Reviews.Content: the door chime has stopped working after few months. its not worth spending on it. does not work even 50 ft away. complete waste of money.

Reviews.Title: A Great Doorbell
Reviews.Author: Raymond E. Jablonski
Reviews.Content: The wireless doorbell has a good operating distance and has good volume and is a very good value for the money

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Hank
Reviews.Content: My last door bell worked well . for a while I hope this one works a lot longer and better

Reviews.Title: Couldn't get it to work right
Reviews.Author: Lara C Haben
Reviews.Content: I bought this because my original doorbell was only working intermittently.  I thought this new doorbell would be easy to install and would work more consistently, but I was wrong.  First off, it looks cheap.  Then, it fell off the wall by the end of the first day, and it was just as inconsistent as the first bell...only ringing once and awhile.  I'm disappointed, but missed my opportunity to send it back.

Reviews.Title: For $12, this is fantastic.
Reviews.Author: TitleWriter
Reviews.Content: The chimes don't sound that great, but they're good enough.  I just chose one that's longer than the others to make sure it got our attention.  They provide two-sided tape to attach the buzzer outside, and it's holding up.  I just put the speaker on a high shelf to get it out of the way.  I also like how it says 'doorbell' on the buzzer.  If you just want a decent doorbell at a good price, this is it.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the price!
Reviews.Author: Kathy Paskey "Kerrkrew"
Reviews.Content: I thought I'd spend a little more and get a better quality doorbell!  After installing the doorbell for my 86 year old Mom we were totally disappointed by the sporadic performance.  What good is it if it doesn't work consistently?Not recommended.

Reviews.Title: Worst Door bell
Reviews.Author: mgtprofessor
Reviews.Content: This is the worst product I ever bougth through Amazon.You can hardly hear the sound. It is worth nothing. I wasted my money on this garbage,

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!
Reviews.Author: Mrs. B
Reviews.Content: We've had the doorbell for about a month now, and it's been reliable and working efficiently.  I do agree with other comments that the volume setting is loud (even on low), but for us in a larger house, it works perfect for our needs.  The different 'ring-tone' options are a little ridiculous, as you can select various non-doorbell settings (ie: pop culture songs), but we found a normal "doorbell" sound we liked, so there's sure to be something for everyone.  My two complaints are: 1. When I received the package, it said not to place "in rain or direct sunlight".  Being an outdoor doorbell, that's really my only option, so I've gone ahead and placed it near my door, so I'll be curious to see if it'll hold up in the winter during our "rainy season".  And 2. to mount the doorbell was a double-sided sticker pad.  I mounted it this way, only to find that it fell off the wall a couple weeks later (maybe due to the rain?), so I then saw there are screw 'notches' that indicate a place to screw it down...so that's what I did to make sure it's more secure.  Other than that, for the price it's at, I'm happy with my purchase.  If it doesn't last the year, I'll probably invest in something more expensive, but for the money I felt it was worth a try.

Reviews.Title: Small but works fine
Reviews.Author: Patricia Rowan
Reviews.Content: I got the Voye 72-20488 Wireless Remote Control Doorbell with 10 Different Chimes. Came two days early works great easy to put up. I paid half the price as i paid for the my old wireless doorbell.

Reviews.Title: Dead on Arrival
Reviews.Author: sonohuey "sonohuey"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this doorbell to make the family's life a lot easier when guests arrive at the house.Opened the package up - everything was straight forward for installation. I installed the included battery into the blue button. I opened the interior box part of the doorbell and installed three working AA batteries - confirmed they were working with our camera. The button itself worked, but the interior box did not. Replaced the three AA batteries with three more working AA batteries - again confirmed with camera. Unit would still not power up.As stated in other reviews, the return process through Amazon was very easy. I did not ask for a replacement after reading the other reviews - most of the replacements also showed up not working. I chose the Amazon gift card instead.If you buy this item, I hope it works for you. The compact size and ease of installment would have been nice.

Reviews.Title: Tried two....neither worked.
Reviews.Author: Radio Ranch "Pat"
Reviews.Content: First unit did not work.  Replacement arrived in good time, but it does not work.  Returned both.  Will try another brand/type.  The only positive:  Amazon return procedures on-line are easy and quick.

Reviews.Title: great deal!
Reviews.Author: Bob W
Reviews.Content: This was an inexpensive and easy fix for a common problem -- college kids that live on the upper floors and don't have a doorbell of their own. My son was tired of missing the FedEx or UPS guy, and with this bell, he knows it's "for him" when it rings.It got delivered quickly, and he installed it in a matter of minutes!!Cooool deal -- and -- Dad looked like a genius!!  lol !!

Reviews.Title: Works fine, a little loud
Reviews.Author: sal
Reviews.Content: Using these on some small houses, they receive and sound great, although they are a little loud even on low. As I had the actual receiver/chime on top of some shelves, I faced the speaker to the wall and now they are perfect, loud enough to be heard throughout but, not so loud as to be annoying.

Reviews.Title: button defective
Reviews.Author: nikki
Reviews.Content: I like all the different chime options.  Doorbell button very flimsy; broke just outside of return window.  Money was wasted.

Reviews.Title: Oh, no you don't
Reviews.Author: lindalu
Reviews.Content: I live in an apartment and am very cautious about safety.  I have purchase many entry alarms for doors and windows.  This is the best for the price.  Good quality materials.  Replacement batteries are not expensive.  Easy to install.  Since I live in a townhouse, the second remote allows me to hear the doorbell when someone arrives.  I like the entry notice feature as well.  I think I need to get another one of these for my daughter, actually.  All good things to say about this product.

Reviews.Title: ITS CRAP!
Reviews.Author: ken
Reviews.Content: WORKED FOR 1 DAY ONLY THEN BROKEN AFTER ABOUT 10 USES. BE WARNED, POOR QUALITY.DO NOT BUY THIS JUNK.

Reviews.Title: WIRELESS DOORBELL
Reviews.Author: Tab
Reviews.Content: JUST WHAT I HAVE BEEN LOOKING FOR.  SOMETIMES I AM UPSTAIRS AND CAN NOT HEARD SOMEONE KNOCK ON THE DOOR DOWNSTAIRS.  A PLUS.

Reviews.Title: Looking forward to hearing those chimes.
Reviews.Author: Beatrice Green
Reviews.Content: I have not installed it yet. but looking forward to doing so. I need my son to do the installation since I can not.

Reviews.Title: Sub-Standard product
Reviews.Author: John R. English
Reviews.Content: Product was NOT as advertised,Poorly made product, did not work out of the boxFast service, received product in two daysWould NOT pruchase again.

ProductInfo.Features:
Features include: Wireless Design Range is approximately 250-Feet
Choose from 10 different chimes Chimes can be set to High, Medium and Low volume settings Easy to install
Chime measures 3875 x 2625 x 1-Inch Ringer measures: 875 x 15 x 275
Ringer includes adhesive back for easy mounting Transmitter requires one 12 volt battery (included) and chime requires 3 "AA" batteries (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Voye 72-20488 Wireless Remote Control Doorbell with 10 Different Chimes
